General.Name: Silver Predator Corp
General.Description: Silver Predator Corp., an exploration stage company, engages in the exploration and development of resource properties in the United States. It primarily explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. The company was formerly known as Platoro West Holdings Inc. and changed its name to Silver Predator Corp. in June 2010. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada. Silver Predator Corp operates as a subsidiary of Till Capital Corporation.
General.Address: 666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2X8
